rows.label: fev02_270_125_msg0001
rows.name:
So...what do you actually need
to finish this artificial Blade?

rows.label: fev02_270_125_msg0002
rows.name:
One Perfect Range Sensor and
three Bion Connectors!

rows.label: fev02_270_125_msg0003
rows.name:
I don't think I've ever heard of
either of those...

rows.label: fev02_270_125_msg0004
rows.name:
Perfect Range Sensor supplements
function of eyes in artificial Blade.

rows.label: fev02_270_125_msg0005
rows.name: Quite pricey item, but very important.

rows.label: fev02_270_125_msg0007
rows.name:
That have many uses, but mostly
to prevent hat fall off.

rows.label: fev02_270_125_msg0008
rows.name:
Would an ordinary piece of string
not suffice...?

rows.label: fev02_270_125_msg0009
rows.name: So, um...where can we buy these items?

rows.label: fev02_270_125_msg0011
rows.name:
Is just off to the left after
entering Trigo city.

rows.label: fev02_270_125_msg0012
rows.name:
I'm sure we must have walked
past that area before.
